fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel image_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Bharti Entrepreneur of the year” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2003-Bharati-Award-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2003″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ranbir Singh Khadwalia has been awarded ―Bharti Entrepreneur of the year award by Bharti Centre Entrepreneurial Initiatives (BCEI).

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Udyog Ratna Award 2005″ image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2005-Udyog-Ratna-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2005″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ranbir Singh Khadwalia being awarded ―Udyog Ratna Award 2005 presented by Shri Virbhadra Singh Hon‘ble Chief Minister of Himachal Pradesh.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Great Indian Tractor Journey” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2012-The-Great-Indian-Tractor-Journey-Certificate-of-India-Book-of-Record-2012-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2012″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We achieved the great Indian Tractor Journey from Baddi to Kanyakumari covering 28 cities and approximately 7000 kms.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Longest Himalayan expedition on tractor” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2012-Himalayan-Expedition-Certificate-of-Limca-Book-of-Record-2012-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2012″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Indofarm tractor creates longest Himalayan expedition on tractor, covering 3623; kms in 14 days started from Baddi Solan, Himachal Pradesh at 7.30 pm on 23 May 2012 and returned at 11 am on 6 June 2012 having crossed 12 Himalayan passes including Khardungla pass (18380 ft).

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Emerging brand in Agriculture Sector” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2013-Exmerging-Brand-in-Agricultuer-Sector-Awar-by-ABP-News-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2013″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Recognised as Emerging brand in Agriculture Sector Award 2013 by ABP News

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”CZARS of North” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2015-CZARS-of-North-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2015″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Anshul Khadwalia being awarded ―CZARS of North -2015‖ by Hon‘ble Deputy Chief Minister of Punjab.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Zee Excellence Awards” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2016-Excellence-Award-by-Zee-News-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2016″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Anshul Khadwalia being awarded ―Zee Excellence Awards 2016 Excellence in Business‖ by Hon‘ble Governor of Himachal Pradesh.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Young Achiever Award” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2016-Young-Achiever-Award-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2016″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Anshul Khadwalia being as Awarded ―Young Achiever Award 2016 by Hon‘ble Chief Minister of Punjab.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Most Influential Rural Marketing Professionals of India” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2017-CMO-Asia-Presented-Most-Influential-Rural-Marketing-Professionals-of-India-scaled.jpg” badge_text=”2017″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Recognised as 50 most Influential Rural Marketing Professionals of India by World Brand Congress Asia.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][/dsm_card_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
Bharti Entrepreneur of the year

Ranbir Singh Khadwalia has been awarded ―Bharti Entrepreneur of the year award by Bharti Centre Entrepreneurial Initiatives (BCEI).

Udyog Ratna Award 2005

Ranbir Singh Khadwalia being awarded ―Udyog Ratna Award 2005 presented by Shri Virbhadra […]
